      • upload

        void upload​(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
            javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType archiveType,
            WorkFlow workflow,
            java.lang.String action)
     throws VitamException
        Upload compressed SIP as stream
        Parameters:
        archiveType - is a format (mime type) of SIP (should be zip ,tar, tar.gz or tar.bz2)
        inputStream - SIP
        workflow - workflow information
        action - Identifier
        Throws:
        VitamException - if stream is null
